passive_2: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them generates a permanent stack and grants you 15 (+ 2 per stack) bonus attack damage for 90 seconds.

passive_1: Scoring a champion takedown summons a Statue of yourself near the outer side of the spawn. For each takedown scored, gain a rank that upgrades your Statue.
passive_2: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants you 15 (+ 2 per Statue rank) bonus attack damage for 90 seconds.
motd: Hotfix: Eminence base bonus attack damage increased to 15 from 10. Bonus attack damage per statue increased to 2 from 1. Duration increased to 90 seconds from 60
